definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: I want to send a fax for you , please open your facsimile machine .
sentences.chinese: 我有傳真電報發給你，請打開傳真機。

sentences.english: I want to send a fax.
sentences.chinese: 我想發一份傳真電報去美國。
